Elements.Name: nModel
Description: Select character model to play with

Elements.Name: nLanguage
Description: Select voice-over language (You MUST also change voice-over language at in-game Options for this to work properly)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Select result music

Elements.Name: bCamera
Description: Enable camera control from Sonic 06, use right-stick to move camera, left-trigger to reset

Elements.Name: bCameraInvertX
Description: Invert X-Axis on right-stick camera control

Elements.Name: bCameraInvertY
Description: Invert Y-Axis on right-stick camera control

Elements.Name: bPhysics
Description: Enable 06 physics, this includes character speed & rail lock-on, disable lock-on cursor is recommended

Elements.Name: bCharacterMoveset
Description: Enable using all current character's movesets from 06, refer to README.txt for moveset list

Elements.Name: bXAction
Description: Maps all actions to X button (including Lightspeed Dash), boost maps to right-trigger and drift maps to B button

Elements.Name: bNoBoost
Description: Start stages without any boost

Elements.Name: bNoCursor
Description: Disable lock-on cursor, recommended for 06 physics, however 06 physics has shorter range homing attack, enabling lock-on cursor can help you adjust to it

Elements.Name: bNoTrick
Elements.DisplayName: Disable Trick on Rainbow Ring & Trick Ramp
Description: Disable Trick on Rainbow Ring and Trick Ramp, this is NOT the same as community code by Hyper, this retains the rainbow ring animation

Elements.Name: bRapidSpindash
Description: (Required using 06 character movesets) Allows charging spindash while running or spindashing, but this will disable anti-gravity

Elements.Name: nRun
Description: Enable running goal at result screen

Elements.Name: sRunStages
Elements.DisplayName: Custom List of Running Goal Stages
Description: Enable running goal with the listed stages (check README.txt for stages list)
06 Sonic Model
06 Sonic + Elise Model
English voice
Japanese voice
Use Sonic 06 result music
Use Sonic 06 Demo result music from E3
Use Generations result music
Use normal goal animation
Always use running goal animation
Use gunning goal on Sonic 06 specific stages (Wave Ocean, Crisis City, Radical Train, Kingdom Valley)
